title: Riverstation is NOW LEASING - 4 Bedroom Available Now!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'NOTE:', "Additional availability outside our community's normal office hours is available BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.", 'Please contact our on-site management & leasing team at any time via phone or email at any time for additional information.', 'Riverstation Apartments is NOW LEASING!', 'Our community offers gorgeous two, three & four bedroom apartment homes – all at an affordable price!', 'Set in a prime Dallas location, our surrounding neighborhood contains many dining, shopping and various entertainment options!', 'Each apartment home incorporates everything you’re looking for in a home.', 'Featuring include open floorplans with energy efficient kitchen appliances, dishwasher & garbage disposal, walk-in closets, tons of natural sunlight, an additional storage area AND a private patio or balcony space.', 'A number of fantastic community amenities are also available at Riverstation which include a beautiful community clubhouse, convenient on-site laundry facility, sparkling outdoor swimming pool, gated entry access, outdoor playground and a 24-hour emergency maintenance service.', 'Don’t wait & give us a call to schedule a personal tour of your new home today.', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Dishwasher & Garbage Disposal', '- On-Site Renovation In Progress - Upgrades & Updates Coming Soon!', '- Courtesy Patrol Service', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '- Business Center', '- Fully-Equipped Kitchen Appliance Package', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', '- Near Public Transportation', 'We are a pet-friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome.', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'Riverstation Apartments participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $42,000 | 2 Occupants: $48,000 | 3 Occupants: $54,000 | 4 Occupants: $60,000 | 5 Occupants: $64,800 | 6 Occupants: $69,600 | 7 Occupants: $74,400 | 8 Occupants: $79,200.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:', 'show contact info', 'Riverstation Apartments', '220 Stoneport Drive', 'Dallas, TX, 75217', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'II4yxYI68G1r']
